channel.title: Login urls/symbols
channel.description: When u log in, there is type that automatically appears in the chatbox at the bottom of the screen. Like "welcome to whatever-scape". How do you make it so that there is clickable urls that like open your Internet browser and go to like your forums. And also how do you make mod or admin crowns appear? Thanks for helping!!

item.title: Login urls/symbols
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Mighty Penguin:

Well, you can’t really add URL’s to your chatbox. You can add a URL to it and tell them to go there…(:

Its possible to add a click-able URL to your chatbox. I thought there was a tutorial somewhere. Try searching.

Read full topic
